channel.title: Sunday Cooking on Stumped Mom
channel.description: Recent content in Sunday Cooking on Stumped Mom

item.title: What to Cook this Thanksgiving
item.description: What to Cook this Thanksgiving Is Thanksgiving the only day of the year that you get serious about cooking? If you’re like most Americans it probably is. Recent surveys and market trends like meal kits and steady restaurant growth as well as the ever popularity of processed and frozen foods indicate that most Americans don’t cook. Cooking,like so many other activities in America has become a commodified spectector’s sport. While less than 15% of us enjoy cooking, 80% of us enjoy watching cooking shows.
